name: The Middle Land  A Hidden Paradise

metadata.name: Key Monastery
metadata.description:
The Golden hour at Key Monastery is one of the best things I have experienced by far. Sunsets are always the best time and I try my best to capture the best of them. The feeling of setting sun that brings an unknown calmness in the heart and lightness to the mind is beyond. I always go into a meditative state when I am surrounded by the force of nature and how could I not witness it through my lens. The air is so magical here, the water so pure, the lights that guide you home.

Size- 7690 × 5129
300DPI
Location - Spiti valley, Himachal Pradesh
Year- 2022
